channel.title: MySQL help
channel.description: ok im not sure if this is the right section but i dint think this would go in the client section so here it goes.im using ipbfree to host my forums but how do i make it so players HAVE to register before they use the forums

item.title: MySQL help
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I would consider using MySQL to hook your server to your forums is help.

[quote=“m is ftw, post:3, topic:276883”][quote author=o.O O.o link=topic=365554.msg2772639#msg2772639 date=1241310672]
Change title to MySQL help; you won’t get flamed (MySQL is what people use)
[/quote] thanks[/quote]

You’re welcome.
